title-part.text: TIME OR ATTENDANCE REGISTERS
REGISTERING OR INDICATING THE WORKING OF MACHINES
GENERATING RANDOM NUMBERS
VOTING OR LOTTERY APPARATUS
ARRANGEMENTS, SYSTEMS OR APPARATUS FOR CHECKING NOT PROVIDED FOR ELSEWHERE

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Registering, indicating or recording the time of events or elapsed time, e.g. time-recorders for work people

reference.text: registering or indicating the working of machines or vehicles G07C3/00, G07C5/00

note.note-paragraph: Subgroups G07C1/20 - G07C1/32 take precedence over subgroups G07C1/02 - G07C1/18

title-part.text: not involving the registering, indicating or recording of other data
wherein the time is indicated in figures
with apparatus adapted for use with individual cards
wherein the time is indicated by marking an element, e.g. a card or tape, in position determined by the time
together with the recording, indicating or registering of other data, e.g. of signs of identity
wherein the time is indicated in figures
with apparatus adapted for use with individual cards
wherein the time is indicated by marking an element, e.g. a card or tape, in a position determined by the time
with apparatus adapted for use with individual cards
Checking timed patrols, e.g. of watchman
in connection with sports or games
Race time-recorders
Pigeon-timing or like equipment
Indicating playing time
Parking meters

reference.text: registering or indicating waiting time of vehicles by means driven by the vehicle G07C5/02; coin-freed parking meters G07F17/24

reference.text: apparatus forming part of taximeters G07B13/00

title-part.text: using counting means or digital clocks
in graphical form
Registering or indicating performance data other than driving, working, idle, or waiting time, with or without registering driving, working, idle or waiting time

reference.text: testing of vehicles G01M17/00; testing of electrical installation on vehicles G01R31/005

CPC-specific-text.text: Indicating performance data, e.g. occurrence of a malfunction

reference.text: recording measured values G01D; information storage G11B

CPC-specific-text.text: wherein the data carrier is removable
the electronic data carrier being a digital video recorder in combination with video camera
wherein the data carrier is removable
Video recorder in combination with video camera

title-part.text: using counting means or digital clocks
in graphical form
Details or accessories common to the registering or indicating apparatus of groups G07C3/00 and G07C5/00
Individual registration on entry or exit

note.note-paragraph: This group covers: controlling and registering access of persons to restricted areas or devices

This group does not cover: electric permutation locks using mechanical keys, covered by E05B49/00; apparatus actuated by coded identity cards or credit cards, to free or actuate vending, hiring or money-dispensing, covered by G07F7/08; access to facilities or services by means of coins or tokens, covered by G07F17/00; arrangements actuated by coded cards for dispensing or receiving money and posting such transactions to existing accounts, e.g. automatic teller machines, covered by G07F19/00

Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search: G06K7/00, G06K19/00 arrangements for sensing or reading record carriers H03K17/00 electronic switching G06K9/00 biometric sensors, recognising biometric patterns A61B5/117 biometric identification used for diagnostic purposes G06F1/00 access to data processing equipment

CPC-specific-text.text: Electronically operated locks; Circuits therefor; Nonmechanical keys therefor, e.g. passive or active electrical keys or other data carriers without mechanical keys

reference.text: mechanical locks with electric permutation E05B49/00; arrangements for sensing or reading record carriers G06K7/00, G06K9/00; electronic switching H03K17/00

the keyless data carrier having only one limited data transmission rangs
the keyless data carrier having more than one limited data transmission ranges
the keyless data carrier being hand operated
by more than one push button

the transmittted data signal containing a code which is changed
periodically, e.g. after a time period
dynamically, e.g. variable code - rolling code
the keyless data carrier having more than one function

keyless data carrier having more than one limited data transmission ranges

whereby the wake-up circuit is situated in the keyless data carrier

starting with prompting the keyless data carrier

whereby the code is a variable code

keyless data carrier having more than one function
opening and locking of all locks at the same time
comprising means to detect or avoid relay attacks
using personal physical data of the operator, e.g. finger prints, retinal images, voicepatterns
operated by interacting with a central unit

for cargo, freight or shipping containers and applications therefore in general
Electronic keys comprising a mechanical key within their housing, e.g. extractable or retractable emergency key
Electronic keys comprising a non-biometric sensor

title-part.text: Movable barriers with registering means
with arrangements to prevent the passage of more than one individual at a time
involving the use of a pass
having a variable access code

note.note-paragraph:
Group G07C9/21 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G07C9/27.
Groups G07C9/27 and G07C9/21 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: the system having a variable access-code, e.g. varied as a function of time

title-part.text: in combination with an identity check of the pass holder
by means of a password
by means of a handwritten signature

CPC-specific-text.text: visually, e.g. by comparing in a viewer the written signature with a reference on the pass
electronically, e.g. by comparing signal of hand-writing with a reference signal from the pass

title-part.text: using biometric data, e.g. fingerprints, iris scans or voice recognition
using a biometric sensor integrated in the pass
with central registration

note.note-paragraph:
Group G07C9/27 is impacted by reclassification into group G07C9/21.
Groups G07C9/27 and G07C9/21 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.
